The agency awarded three contracts: $700 million to Lockheed Martin, $692 million to Northrop Grumman and $382 million to York Space for the Transport Layer Tranche 1

articles.author: Nicole Wetsman
articles.title: Telehealth visits now available through Amazon Alexa - The Verge
articles.description: Amazon Echo customers can access Teladoc’s telehealth services through their devices by asking Alexa to connect them with a doctor.
articles.content:
Customers can talk with Teladoc providers through Echo devices
Photo by Dan Seifert / The Verge
